title: Citibank Czech Republic Introduces Citikonto Plus Products & Services Package
summary: Prague - Citibank in the Czech Republic is expanding its offering to retail clients with a new package of products and services called Citikonto Plus. This highly attractive package allows clients to choose any combination of the bank's services with options of current savings and investments accounts according to individual needs. Together with the account, clients will get a debit card, internet, telephone and mobile banking service free of charge. The new Citikonto Plus also features up to four free monthly withdrawals from any ATM in the Czech Republic.
tag-1: Citibank Czech Republic Introduces Citikonto Plus Products & Services Package
tag-2: Prague – Citibank in the Czech Republic is expanding its offering to retail clients with a new package of products and services called Citikonto Plus. This highly attractive package allows clients to choose any combination of the bank's services with options of current savings and investments accounts according to individual needs. Together with the account, clients will get a debit card, internet, telephone and mobile banking service free of charge. The new Citikonto Plus also features up to four free monthly withdrawals from any ATM in the Czech Republic.
tag-3: "If a client uses the Citikonto Plus package actively, there are no fees charged for its maintenance. In order to qualify, either minimum monthly incoming transactions of CZK 25,000 are required, or the client must have at least a CZK 250,000 average monthly account balance in all accounts within the Citikonto Plus," says Petr Rehák, Retail Bank Head at Citibank. "In case the client is not an active user of Citikonto Plus, he or she will be charged CZK 169 per month for its maintenance. However, the first three months from signing the contract are free of charge for everybody."
tag-4: An interesting benefit of Citikonto Plus is the opportunity to open a separate package for relatives of the account owner at no cost. Thus, parents can control their children's finances , and spouses can maintain their finances together without having a common bank account.
tag-5: All Citikonto Plus clients can also use discounts within the CitiClub program offering up to 25 percent discounts at more than 200 merchants and service providers in the Czech Republic.
tag-6: "Currently Citikonto Plus can be opened at Citibank's branches. In the coming months, the product will also be offered through other distribution channels," adds Rehák.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
